title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB:
When the key is blank in the properties file, it still has a valid value.

Observed Behavior: The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: Expected Behavior: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank but provide a valid value.
3. Add the localization key to the chart.
4. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
